para.text: Archive list files can also be added by dragging them from Windows Explorer and dropping them on to the list of archive lists.

The order of the archive lists in the list of archive lists can be rearranged by selecting one of the file names and dragging to a new position in the list of archive lists. The order of the files names affects the order in which models appear in the
pane. You can also select a file name from the list of archive lists, right click, and then select Delete from the pop-up menu to delete an archive list from the list of archive lists.
